name: Project Burst
description:
Project Burst

Project Burst is an intuitive shooter that strives for an experience that is unique from all other common FPS games. In this test version, you can play through a few showcase levels to get a solid understanding of what will be implemented into the final game later along the lines of its development. Test your skills in a fun minigame, made to showcase the weapon uses and ways you can interact with a placeholder AI.
